snippet.title: Core Keeper - Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
After a year and a half of hard work, we are excited to release Core Keeper into Steam Early Access today!

Get it on Steam NOW: https://bit.ly/3sCXeoS
Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/corekeepergame
Join our Community on Discord: www.discord.gg/corekeeper
Check out our TikToks: www.tiktok.com/@corekeepergame

Core Keeper is a 1-8 player mining sandbox adventure game where you play as an Explorer transported to a mysterious underground world.

After discovering an ancient relic known only as “The Core”, you’ll dig deeper into this strange landscape, mining minerals, farming crops, crafting tools, battling monsters, and building bases in unique biomes; all while exploring the underground and taking on GIANT bosses to power up The Core, uncover its secrets, and maybe even find a way home.

With charming pixel-art graphics and an enchanting soundtrack from composer Jonathan Geer, Core Keeper is one of those games you’ll jump into and then realise you’ve been playing for hours.
